dct_description_sm: Im Verlag des Homannischen Erben zu N체rnberg Ao. 1784 ; Mit Kayserlichem Allergn채d Privilegio.
California is an unsual shape, almost forming an island. It is labeled but with no place names.
Includes German text and tables in lower third.
Shows Cook's tracks; an unusual configuratiion of Alaska; Great Lakes shown as one lake; Van Diemens Land connected to mainland.
